classes

Class Hero

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.Character
      • classes.Hero

  • public class Hero
extends Character
    Hero is a child class for the Heroes And Villains application. It extends the character class.
    Author:
    Adam Conway, Flynn Doherty

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hero

        public Hero(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String iconUrl,
            int attack,
            int defense,
            int maxHealth,
            java.lang.String type,
            java.lang.String description,
            java.lang.String shortDescription)
        Parameters:
        name - is the hero's name
        iconUrl - is the location of the file containing the hero's icon image
        attack - is the hero's attack value
        defense - is the hero's defense value
        maxHealth - is the maximum health the hero has
        type - is the hero's type. It can be one of either: Merchant, Medic, Tank, Assassin, Explorer and Vampire
        description - is the hero's description
        shortDescription - is the displayed version of the hero description. This describes the functionality of the hero type
